skills.label: Manage workbook changes
items: Track changes, manage comments, identify errors, troubleshoot with tracing, display all changes, retain all changes

skills.label: Apply advanced conditional formatting and filtering
items: Write custom conditional formats, use functions to format cells, create advanced filters, manage conditional formatting rules

skills.label: Prepare a workbook for internationalization and accessibility
items: Modify tab order among workbook elements and objects, display data in multiple international formats, modify worksheets for use with accessibility tools, utilize international symbols, manage multiple options for +body and +heading fonts

skills.label: Look up data with functions
items: Utilize the lookup function, utilize the vlookup function, utilize the hlookup function, utilize the transpose function

skills.label: Apply advanced date and time functions
items: Utilize the now and today functions, use functions to serialize dates and times

skills.label: Create advanced chart elements
items: Add trendlines to charts, create dual axis charts, create custom chart templates, view chart animations

skills.label: Create and manage PivotTables
items: Create new pivottables, modify field selections and options, create a slicer, group records, utilize calculated fields, format data, utilize powerpivot, manage relationships
